author: kfogel
msg: Working with Mike Pilato, fix part of issue #1000:
Ensure that there is no point in an update or switch when an entries
file is inaccurate, by making certain entry url changes happen in sync
with the edit, instead of relying on svn_wc__do_update_cleanup().
Note that this does not address the wcprop problems described in the
new_URL as well, and tweaks the directory unconditionally.
(make_dir_baton): Fix new_URL calculation logic, and store the
new_URL in the bump_dir_info structure too.  Use new helper
get_entry_url.  Also, remove some truly redundant comments :-).
(make_file_baton): Fix new_URL calculation logic.  Use new helper
